c74object.name: wa.blocks.key
c74object.description: bundles key pressed and release events, as well as an active output while the key is held down.

objarg.name: name
objarg.description:
the letter or number on the key.
use "space" for the space bar.

attribute.name: toggle
attribute.digest: change the behaviour of the active output

method.name: forceActive
method.description:
force the internal value that is passed on to the output
only usefull in toggle mode

method.name: setKey
method.description:
the letter or number on the key.
use "space" for the space bar.

method.name: toggle
method.digest: change the behaviour of the active output
method.description:
If set to 0 active will have a value of 1 for as long as the key is heled down.
If set to 1 active will have a value of 1 between successive key presses.
